review: Brought several of these, looks like most of them are having a problem.  The one's I gave to my family some don't work after a month of use, and I had two fire TV's, the stick and the box, within a month or so both of them went blank.  Amazon did replace them, so that's good, but I would not recommend buying them, I think it is not stable, and has some real problems with the software.

review: I've only had it a short while, but I really like it.It's portable and practical and has a ton of great movies and TV Shows available with Amazon Prime.I've had my Fire TV Stick for a couple of weeks now and I just wanted to add some things... I really love this item, a lot! When combined with Amazon Prime it opens up a ton of great content. All the shows from TV and the great movies. You've got access to movies that I could never find with Netflix and cable TV and Hulu. It's probably the only streaming device that anyone would ever need!
